thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 8 of 1908
thread.title: Margaret

author: Margaret
title: Margaret
text:
Loved how your Web page was set up. Extremely easy to use & get info from. Quick with sending updates as to flight changes in times & prices. Great prices on your web pages. Really liked that you had flights for up to 12 months out. This will be the 1st place I will go to for my next trip. Really liked that I was able to pick my seats right after purchasing my ticket, something I did not have to think about doing in the future - it was taken care of.
Keep up the great work. Can not thank you enough for the great experience while working with you...
